Tag_Imageneed.description: Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — [[Legacy of the First Blade]]

MemoryInfobox.name: Order of the Storm
MemoryInfobox.description: 'The reach of the Order of the Ancients had extended deep into the heart of Greece|Greek naval operations. Kassandra moved to uncover and destroy their influence before they could sway the war in their favor.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'Legacy of the First Blade: Shadow Heritage'

General_Description: '''Order of the Storm''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra uncovered and assassinated all members of the [[Order of the Storm]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[Legacy of the First Blade: Shadow Heritage]]''
